2024-08-27T12-15-37Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{}}

2024-08-27T12-15-37Z.workflow:
name: Clean up Preview Deployment
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [closed]

jobs:
  delete-preview:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Delete Neon Branch
        uses: neondatabase/delete-branch-action@v3.1.3
        with:
          project_id: ${{ secrets.NEON_PROJECT_ID }}
          branch: preview/pr-${{ github.event.number }}-${{ github.event.pull_request.head.ref }}
          api_key: ${{ secrets.NEON_API_KEY }}
